user_agent.objective: Plan a 6-week digital nomad workation across Bali, Chiang Mai, and Lisbon with reliable internet, coworking spaces, and work-life balance.
user_agent.initial_message: I'm planning a 6-week digital nomad trip across Bali, Chiang Mai, and Lisbon. I need reliable internet, good coworking spaces, and accommodations that support remote work. Can you help me plan this workation?
user_agent.user_persona: Professional remote worker seeking productive work environments while experiencing new cultures; values work-life balance and networking opportunities.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially want beach destinations only, then switch to mountain towns when shown better internet reliability and coworking options.
When asked about work hours, provide invalid format '9am to 5pm EST' first; after system flags timezone issue, correct to local time zones.
Request guaranteed 24/7 technical support in every location, then accept realistic coworking space support when explained.
Coworking space search returns results for wrong cities; system should detect location mismatch and request corrected searches.
Internet speed information request times out; retry succeeds with comprehensive connectivity details for each location.
Accommodation booking fails due to missing work equipment requirements; retry with proper specifications succeeds.

success_criteria: System finds nomad-friendly accommodations with reliable internet and work-friendly amenities across all three destinations.
System handles user.change_mind by pivoting from beach to mountain destinations based on internet reliability and coworking availability.
System validates and corrects work hours timezone format before proceeding with schedule planning.
System explains impossibility of 24/7 technical support and provides realistic coworking space support options.
System handles tool.unexpected_output by detecting wrong city coworking results and requesting corrected location-specific searches.
System handles tool.timeout on internet information by retrying and providing comprehensive connectivity details.
System handles tool.validation_error on accommodation booking by retrying with complete work equipment requirements.
System plans efficient work schedules across different time zones while maintaining work-life balance.
System includes visa requirements for remote work in each destination country.
System creates comprehensive workation itinerary with coworking spaces, reliable internet, and productivity-focused accommodations.
